#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Statistics.

== Name ==

*[CStatistics Statistics]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Statistics (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				List of statistics computed over the same type.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
    
===  Model ===

	<...  other = xs:string  
            *type = [SStatisticCollectionTypesEnum StatisticCollectionTypesEnum]*
          >  ([CCollection collection], [CStatisticValue value]+  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CCollection golfml:Collection] || [CCollection collection] ||  Information regarding the collection of the statistic ||
|| [CStatisticValue golfml:StatisticValue] || [CStatisticValue value] ||  						Value of a statistic computed for the supplied collection type.					 ||
